modName: How to completely change your character
summary: Tutorial on how to race/sex change your character
descriptionHtml:
As it stands this is obsolete. all you need to do is take note of what your stats are before you go changing sex or race.

Hello guys. if your like me and get bored of running around as the same boring race and sex that you chose at the start of the game, then this is the file for you!

NOTE : This is a step by step guide on how to change your character, it isnt exactly a mod that has to be installed.

RECOMMENDED: 
I highly recommend getting T3nd0s Skyrim Redone (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286) as it will give you a potion that refunds all your perk points!
And also Perk Point Book - SKSE by Inigo21 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25607) because SkyRe doesnt refund perk points added by mods and for some strange reason doesnt always refund all your perk points...

its a complete working tutorial of how to completely change your character without totaly messing up your skills, atributes and perks!

As for racials it removes them as shown in screenshot.
note as high elf i have 180 magicka because of the +50 magic racial
as khajiit i have 130 because i dont have the racial anymore.

also if your missing racials just simply save. exit to menu and reload

bugs - You might lose literaly \"lose your head\" if you use any transformaion spells.

Vampire bug fix curtesy of Brehanin2
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9717

one thing. Dont try to be smart and use the \"Setrace\" console commands or when you come to load your character after you exit the game you wont have a head.
author: Goldigger1990

files.name: Your guide to the new you
